content: hi the free pattern can be viewed in it s entirety on the blog through the link here on ravelry there is also an ad-free printable version available in my etsy shop for purchase here 1 enjoy ever popular eyelets grace this openwork cardigan that s light drapey and perfect for year round wear featuring an oversized fit and an airy design it s super cute with cut-off shorts and jeans alike take the trendy look of the classic granny square cardigan up a notch while avoiding the seaming and sewing of squares a super fun and meditative project for advanced beginners on up skill level easy + materials us size j 6 0 mm crochet hook 5 5 6 7 7 lion brand mandala light #3 yarn in centaur 150 g/skein pattern uses approximately 470 g 562 g 660 g 767 g 883 g scissors tapestry needle sizes s-xxl 1 https //www etsy com/listing/1014087711/endless-eyelets-cardigan-crochet-pattern ref=shop_home_active_1
